channel.title: Making a rs mauler
channel.description:
here's aguide i iused to make my mauler, if theres no replies im naking out...and if u like rep me :D
Obby mauler guide!! By: m4ul3r n00b and dragansparta Step 1: first you need to get An awesome name that’s hard to spell, ex: m4ul3r n00b
Step 2: if you are planning to make your account a member right away I recommend you get the following items: full iron, obby cape, str ammy, climbing boots OUR any others, leather vamps, about 2k iron arrows or 3k iron knives, and a obby maul…and to train to 60 str I recommend the brine sabre.
Step 3: training your pure will take much patience and lotsa cash, lol but don’t worry it will pay off. First you must train from 1-25 str on cows, collect cowhides for extra cash, then train 25-45 on either monks or chickens, then the rest will be on the rock crabs… the reason u need ranging supplies is to get to 40 range, you will learn why later on in the guide.
Step 3: there are 3 important quests you will need done, 1 is death platue for climbing boots, which give str bonus, and the other is animal magnabolism for the backpack thingy that collects your arrows.
Step 4:pking time!!!! Now you should have 60-65 str and 40-50 range, so go to bank and get green dhide chaps, monks top, the back pack from “animal magnabolism”, climbing boots, glory ammy, obby maul, and lots of black knives…and 1 super str with monks…no sharks, waste of money!!!!!!
I hope you learned something and if you want a more detailed and more specific guide, we are selling them for 15k ea. Have fun!!!!

item.title: Making a rs mauler
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Mauler: fail. Nothing good comes out of being a mauler. You’re weak, and your only advantage is a few specials that DON’T hit half of the time. If you’re going to be pure, stick to 1 stat. It’s your best bet to actually be good in the game. Don’t go range/melee right away, either. If you where intending on being a mauler, I’d get 30 attack, then 40 strength, then 40 attack and 50 strength, then 50 attack and w/e strength.

After you have your melee stats in order, then you would get a 2nd stat to combine with the horrid maul for its ever-so-wonderful special. Train ranged with a cannon to keep levels low so you’re still somewhat worthy as a hybrid, go get owned by somebody with more than 20 defense.

gL.

Read full topic

You Wear Blk-Rune Knives Berzerker Necklace Obby Maul Monk Robes And Iron Helm(what i prefer w/e u wanna wear on head dont matter) Berzerker Ring And Climbing Boots…

Obby mauler guide!!
By: m4ul3r n00b and dragansparta
Step 1: first you need to get An awesome name that’s hard to spell, ex: m4ul3r n00b

Step 2: if you are planning to make your account a member right away I recommend you get the following items: full iron, obby cape, str ammy, climbing boots OUR any others, leather vamps, about 2k iron arrows or 3k iron knives, and a obby maul…and to train to 60 str I recommend the brine sabre.

Step 3: there are 3 important quests you will need done, 1 is death platue for climbing boots, which give str bonus, and the other is animal magnabolism  for the backpack thingy that collects your arrows.

Step 4:pking time!!!! Now you should have 60-65 str and 40-50 range, so go to bank and get green dhide chaps, monks top, the back pack from “animal magnabolism”, climbing boots, glory ammy, obby maul, and lots of black knives…and 1 super str with monks…no sharks, waste of money!!!!!!
